translations: 内啡肽（有镇痛作用的内分泌激素）

sentences.sentence: Leading endorphin researchers not associated with the study said they accepted its findings.
sentences.translation: 没有做过这个研究的内啡肽研究者说他们接受这个发现。

sentences.sentence: This may be endorphin and Met-enkephalin and the fight against cancer, one of the mechanisms.
sentences.translation: 这可能是内啡肽和甲硫啡肽与癌症斗争的机制之一。

sentences.sentence: But exercise can be a great way to relieve stress, releasing endorphin which will improve your mood.
sentences.translation: 然而，体育锻炼是一种减轻压力的好方法，它会让你心情变好。
